articles.title: BBVA and OpenAI collaborate to transform global banking
articles.summary: BBVA has partnered with OpenAI to revolutionize global banking by integrating AI technology into its operations, aiming to enhance customer experience and improve internal processes. This collaboration is expected to drive innovation in the financial sector, enabling BBVA to stay ahead of the curve in digital transformation. By leveraging OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, BBVA can develop more personalized and efficient services for its customers worldwide.

articles.title: BNY builds “AI for everyone, everywhere” with OpenAI
articles.summary: BNY Mellon has partnered with OpenAI to make artificial intelligence more accessible, aiming to bring "AI for everyone, everywhere" through innovative solutions. This collaboration is expected to drive significant advancements in the financial sector, enhancing customer experiences and streamlining operations. By leveraging OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, BNY Mellon is poised to revolutionize the industry with AI-powered services.

articles.title: How We Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days
articles.summary: The team behind Sora leveraged Codex, a cutting-edge AI-powered coding tool, to rapidly develop and release the Android version of their app in just 28 days. This achievement showcases Codex's potential to significantly accelerate development timelines and improve coding efficiency. By automating routine coding tasks, Codex enabled the Sora team to focus on high-level design and functionality, resulting in a swift and successful launch.

articles.title: Advancing science and math with GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a cutting-edge AI model that promises to revolutionize science and math education by providing personalized learning experiences and automated solutions to complex problems. This innovative technology has the potential to make STEM subjects more accessible and engaging for students of all levels. By leveraging GPT-5.2, educators can create tailored lesson plans and assessments, enhancing the overall learning process.

articles.title: Introducing GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a significant upgrade to the GPT series, boasting enhanced language understanding and generation capabilities. This new model promises to revolutionize natural language processing tasks, such as text summarization, translation, and content creation. With GPT-5.2, users can expect more accurate and human-like interactions with AI systems, opening up new possibilities for applications in various industries.

articles.title: Improved Gemini audio models for powerful voice experiences
articles.summary: Google has upgraded its Gemini audio models, enabling more accurate and efficient voice recognition for a range of applications. This improvement allows for better voice experiences, including enhanced speech-to-text capabilities and more effective voice assistants. The updated models will power more intuitive and responsive voice interactions across various devices and platforms.

articles.title: Deepening our partnership with the UK AI Security Institute
articles.summary: A leading tech company is deepening its partnership with the UK AI Security Institute to advance AI-powered security solutions. This collaboration aims to enhance threat detection and response capabilities, promoting a safer digital landscape. The partnership will drive innovation in AI-driven security, fostering a more secure and resilient cybersecurity ecosystem.

articles.title: Strengthening our partnership with the UK government to support prosperity and security in the AI era
articles.summary: A major tech company has announced a strengthened partnership with the UK government to drive innovation and prosperity in the AI era, focusing on skills development and cybersecurity. This collaboration aims to harness the power of AI to boost economic growth and enhance national security. By working together, the company and the UK government seek to establish the country as a leader in responsible AI development and deployment.

articles.title: FACTS Benchmark Suite: Systematically evaluating the factuality of large language models
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced the FACTS Benchmark Suite, a comprehensive evaluation tool to assess the factuality of large language models, helping to identify and mitigate the spread of misinformation. This suite systematically tests language models' ability to distinguish between factual and false information, promoting more accurate and trustworthy AI-generated content. By using FACTS, developers can refine their models to provide more reliable and factual outputs.

articles.title: Engineering more resilient crops for a warming climate
articles.summary: Scientists are developing more resilient crops to combat the challenges of a warming climate, using innovative engineering techniques to enhance their ability to withstand extreme temperatures and weather conditions. This breakthrough has the potential to improve global food security and mitigate the impacts of climate change on agriculture. By creating climate-resilient crops, researchers aim to ensure a stable food supply for future generations.

articles.title: New in llama.cpp: Model Management
articles.summary: The latest update to llama.cpp introduces model management capabilities, allowing users to easily manage and switch between different AI models. This innovation streamlines the development process and enables more efficient testing and deployment of AI applications. By simplifying model management, llama.cpp enhances the overall usability and flexibility of its AI framework.

articles.title: Codex is Open Sourcing AI models
articles.summary: Codex is making its AI models open-source, allowing developers to access and build upon its innovative technology. This move is expected to accelerate AI advancements and foster a community-driven approach to AI development. By open-sourcing its models, Codex is democratizing access to AI and enabling a wider range of applications and innovations.

articles.title: Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker: Cost-efficient Frontier Multimodal Performance
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker, a cost-efficient AI model that achieves frontier multimodal performance, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in AI processing while reducing computational costs. This innovation enables more efficient processing of multiple data types, such as text, images, and audio. By achieving state-of-the-art results at a lower cost, Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker has the potential to make AI more accessible and widely adopted.

articles.title: Introducing swift-huggingface: The Complete Swift Client for Hugging Face
articles.summary: The swift-huggingface library provides a complete Swift client for Hugging Face, enabling seamless integration of the popular AI model hub into Swift-based projects. This innovation allows developers to easily access and utilize Hugging Face's vast model repository, streamlining AI-powered app development. By bridging the gap between Swift and Hugging Face, developers can now build more intelligent and capable iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS applications.

articles.title: DeepMath: A lightweight math reasoning Agent with smolagents
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced DeepMath, a cutting-edge math reasoning agent that utilizes smolagents, a novel approach to artificial intelligence. This lightweight agent is designed to efficiently solve complex mathematical problems, showcasing significant potential for advancing AI's problem-solving capabilities. By leveraging smolagents, DeepMath achieves impressive results while minimizing computational resources, making it an exciting development in the field of AI and math reasoning.

articles.title: OpenAI are quietly adopting skills, now available in ChatGPT and Codex CLI
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced a new feature called "skills" in ChatGPT and Codex CLI, allowing users to access a range of specialized tools and capabilities. This update enables more precise and efficient interactions, from generating code to creating custom workflows. By integrating skills, OpenAI is expanding the potential applications of its AI models, making them more versatile and user-friendly.

articles.title: macOS 26.2 enables fast AI clusters with RDMA over Thunderbolt
articles.summary: macOS 26.2 introduces a significant update, enabling fast AI clusters with RDMA (Remote Direct Memory Access) over Thunderbolt, allowing for high-speed data transfer and accelerated AI processing. This innovation enables developers to create powerful AI clusters using Macs connected via Thunderbolt, enhancing overall performance and efficiency. By leveraging RDMA, users can expect faster training times and improved model accuracy in AI workloads.

articles.title: Google Removes Sci-Hub Domains from U.S. Search Results Due to Dated Court Order
articles.summary: Google has removed Sci-Hub domains from US search results, complying with a 2017 court order that aimed to curb access to the platform, which provides free access to scientific and academic papers. The move restricts visibility of Sci-Hub in the US, potentially limiting access to research for some users. This development highlights the ongoing debate over copyright, accessibility, and the dissemination of scientific knowledge.

articles.title: Koralm Railway
articles.summary: The Koralm Railway is a high-speed rail project in Austria, featuring a 33km tunnel that enables trains to reach speeds of up to 250km/h. This innovative infrastructure aims to reduce travel times and increase connectivity between major cities. Once completed, the Koralm Railway will significantly boost Austria's transportation network and economic growth.
